scripts.ui: kill -9 $(lsof -ti :5173) 2 > /dev/null || echo 'Port 5173 available...' && cd react && npm run dev
scripts.server: kill -9 $(lsof -ti :8000) 2 > /dev/null || echo 'Port 8000 available...' && cd django && source venv/bin/activate && python manage.py runserver_plus --cert-file ~/.localhost-ssl/localhost.crt --key-file ~/.localhost-ssl/localhost.key 127.0.0.1:8000
